Description.Text: Location This hotel is situated in the Brazilian city of Salvador da Bahia in the Armação district. and lies just a few metres form the shopping and entertainment centre of Aeroclube. The city's international airport lies about 20 km from the hotel. Facilities The hotel offers guests a total of 68 rooms. A restaurant is among the facilities. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. A garage is available for parking. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. Cots are available for younger guests. There is also a minibar. An ironing set is also available for travellers' convenience. Little extras, including internet access, a TV and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. The establishment features a pool and an outdoor pool. Meals Guests can choose options including breakfast, lunch and dinner.
